means: 玷污，毒害，腐蚀（人的思想或品德）

sentence.Network_en: One secret military unit tried to contaminate the drinking water of the refugees.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个秘密军事分队企图污染难民的饮用水。

sentence.Network_en: All over the world, oil spills regularly contaminate coasts.
sentence.Network_cn: 在世界各地，油溢出物经常污染着海岸。

sentence.Network_en: The sources of organisms that may contaminate the wound are numerous.
sentence.Network_cn: 可以沾染伤口的细菌来源是很多的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思词汇表_百度文库 ... consume 消费; 消灭 contaminate 弄脏; 污染 contingency 偶然.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... sinkhole n 阴沟的入口处,排水口,污水坑 contaminate vt 弄污,弄脏,毒害,传染,染污 smudge n 污点,脏污.
字典中浼字的解释 ... ◎ 浼 měi (1) 沾污;玷污[ contaminate] (4) 买;换取[ buy].
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... sinkhole n 阴沟的入口处,排水口,污水坑 contaminate vt 弄污,弄脏,毒害,传染,染污 smudge n 污点,脏污.

list.abs: 空气压缩机 ... 47 、穿透率（  penetation ;transmission ） 48 、污染物（ pillutant;contaminant ） 1、 吸收（  absorption ）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin contaminat- 'made impure', from the verb contaminare, from contamen 'contact, pollution', from con- 'together with' + the base of tangere 'to touch'

entry.def: If something is contaminated by dirt, chemicals, or radiation, they make it dirty or harmful.

example.ex: Have any fish been contaminated in the Arctic Ocean?
example.tran: 北冰洋的鱼受到过污染吗？

example.ex: ...vast tracts of empty land, much of it contaminated by years of army activity.
example.tran: 大片撂荒的土地，其中大部分由于经年累月的战火而受到了污染

means.word_mean: 2. make radioactive by adding radioactive material;

auth_sentence.content: So these are the kinds that contaminate spinach and hamburger.
auth_sentence.res_content: So these are the kinds that contaminate spinach and hamburger.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So these are the kinds that contaminate spinach and hamburger.

auth_sentence.content: Unregulated dumpsites contaminate ground water and burning trash produces harmful emissions.
auth_sentence.res_content: Unregulated dumpsites contaminate ground water and burning trash produces harmful emissions.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Unregulated dumpsites contaminate ground water and burning trash produces harmful emissions.

auth_sentence.content: It can contaminate freshwater sources that are close to the ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content: It can contaminate freshwater sources that are close to the ocean.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It can contaminate freshwater sources that are close to the ocean.

Sentence.sentence: Both strains quickly invaded local hospitals when needle sharing and other unhealthy practices ensured the rapid spreading of the infection by bringing people into contact with contaminated body fluids.
Iced coffees sold by some popular chains are contaminated.

sentences.en: They are contaminating the minds of our young people with these subversive ideas.
sentences.cn: 他们这些颠覆作乱的思想是对我们年轻人的精神污染。

jushi.english: These books are contaminating the minds of our young people.
jushi.chinese: 这些书是对我们年轻人的精神污染。

jushi.english: Large areas of land have been contaminated by the leakage from the nuclear reactor.
jushi.chinese: 大片地区都被核反应堆的泄漏物污染了。

jushi.english: Our students are being contaminated by his extreme right wing ideas!
jushi.chinese: 我们的学生正在受到他的极右观点的毒害!
